content: Electrical engineer **Sun Sumei** is an [electrical engineer](/wiki/Electrical_engineer) from the Institute for Infocomm Research in [Singapore](/wiki/Singaporean_people). She was named a [Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers](/wiki/Fellow_of_the_Institute_of_Electrical_and_Electronics_Engineers) (IEEE) in 2016 for her work in the design and [standardization](/wiki/Standardization) of [wireless communication](/wiki/Wireless_communication) systems. In 2024, she became a laureate of the [Asian Scientist 100](/wiki/Asian_Scientist_100) by the *[Asian Scientist](/wiki/Asian_Scientist)*. This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about an engineer, inventor or industrial designer is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Sun Sumei (engineer)
